snippet: Plans for a mission in the island nation of São Tomé and Príncipe aim to foster defense cooperation.
abstract: Brazilian Navy says it will establish naval mission in small African island nation of Sao Tome and Principe; mission reflects Brazil's hopes of increasing its influence in Africa.
lead_paragraph: Plans for a mission in the island nation of São Tomé and Príncipe aim to foster defense cooperation.

headline.main: Brazil Plans Naval Mission in Africa
headline.print_headline: Brazil: New Naval Mission in Africa Aims to Foster Ties
